buginformation.summary: text extended message format doesn override java text message format equals object
buginformation.description: findbugs bug org apache commons lang text extendedmessageformat doesn override java text messageformat equals object pattern doesnt override equals type category style this class extends class that defines equals method and adds fields but doesn define equals method itself thus equality instances this class will ignore the identity the subclass and the added fields sure this what intended and that you don need override the equals method even you don need override the equals method consider overriding anyway document the fact that the equals method for the subclass just return the result invoking super equals
